name: Ricochet (itch) (neoncowstudios)
description:
A Getting over it and Jumpking inspired game where you play as a climber, looking for the fabled "Magic Deer".

Use your trusty double-barrel shotgun to shoot your way up the mountain.  Be careful, the rocky terrain is steep and the trail is difficult. Each fall could send you right back to the start!

Features:

A fun Mountain Climbing Adventure.

Beautiful Music by Tad On.

Easy Speedrunning with a built-in timer and progress bar.

Meet The Developer:

My name is Eli and I am the sole developer and artist behind Neoncowstudios and Ricochet. I started this game to take a break from other bigger projects I was working on at the time but quickly fell in love with the concept and the way the game was turning out.
